message: This is my initial offer. I propose we split the money 3:2 in favor of Alice.
I'll give you a better deal than your initial offer, but I'm not going for a 3:2 split. This is my best offer so far.
I believe a fair division would be equal splits. This ensures both parties feel valued and respected in our partnership.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. This is my next offer.
